CustomField.description: Please update the budget of the corresponding HeyPakete purchase in the Backend to the new date
CustomField.formula: IF( HeyPakete_Type__c = $Label.HeyPaket_Professional, HeyPakete_End_Date__c + 90, IF( HeyPakete_Type__c = $Label.HeyPaket_Ultimate, HeyPakete_End_Date__c + 180, HeyPakete_End_Date__c ) )
CustomField.label: New budget expiration date
